SpeakerIoInverted.Description: Set to true if the output is inverted

SpeakerEnableOutput.Description: Turns off or on the speaker. The IO from the Buco. Negative value: disabled

SpeakerVolume.Description: Volume from the speaker. Between 0 and 100%

AlarmInput.Description: VTi3/Buco input name. Set value to empty string to disable alarms. Set to 0 to enable alarms, but disable the IO.

ICenterValidation.Description: ICenter Validation. Duty and DutyACK event. Used in iMotion and IRA.

DB_Btn1.Description: Driver bloc button (up to 8). If empty, button is disabled.

HandleGprs.Description: true: Creates and manages the GPRS connection. Make sure not start GPRSNetup.exe. For using GSM calls this value has to be true.

Languages.Description: Languages the driver can choose from. The first item is the default/startup language. Possible values: de,fr,en

Announcment.Description: Announcement. If you enable this, you need the config file(s). Possible values: None, Tts, Mp3
